snippet: Crews at the University of California, Los Angeles, finished major repairs Saturday on a main that burst and poured 20 million gallons of water onto the campus, ruining the new court at Pauley Pavilion.
lead_paragraph: Crews at the University of California, Los Angeles, finished major repairs Saturday on a main that burst and poured 20 million gallons of water onto the campus, ruining the new court at Pauley Pavilion.

headline.main: Crews Repair Water Main at U.C.L.A.
headline.print_headline: Crews Repair Water Main At U.C.L.A.
